mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 18, 2022: Departure from Los Angeles to Detroit

Morning:
- Start your day with a delicious breakfast at DV's Chinese Kitchen (Chinese cuisine) in Los Angeles.
   Address: 91 N Garfield Ave, Alhambra, CA 91801

Afternoon:
- Take a flight from Los Angeles to Detroit. We recommend Flight F3496477 at 15:30 (411 USD per person). This will give you ample time to reach the airport and complete check-in procedures.
   Departure: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX)
   Arrival: Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (DTW)
   Flight Time: 4 hours 23 minutes

Evening:
- Upon arrival in Detroit, take a taxi to your accommodation, Comfort Suites Downtown Detroit. They allow visitors and have diverse dining options nearby.
   Address: 349 E Larned St, Detroit, MI 48201
   Estimated Taxi Fare: $45 - $60 (depending on traffic)

Dinner:
- Enjoy Indian cuisine at Saffron De Twah, located near your accommodation.
   Address: 1016 E Larned St, Detroit, MI 48207

Day 2 - March 19, 2022: Exploring Detroit

Breakfast:
- Start your day with breakfast at Comfort Suites Downtown Detroit.

Morning & Afternoon:
- Visit the Detroit Institute of Arts and explore their impressive collection of American, European, African, Islamic, and Asian art.
   Address: 5200 Woodward Ave, Detroit, MI 48202
   Entrance Fee: $14 per person (discounted rate for two people - $28)

Lunch:
- Head to Ima Japan for some delicious Japanese cuisine.
   Address: 48 E. Cross St., Detroit, MI 48201

Afternoon:
- Visit the Charles H. Wright Museum of African American History to learn about the rich cultural and historical experiences of African Americans.
   Address: 315 E Warren Ave, Detroit, MI 48201
   Entrance Fee: $10 per person (discounted rate for two people - $20)

Dinner:
- Try Mexican food at El Asador Steakhouse.
   Address: 3251 Joe Luis Garcia Hwy, Detroit, MI 48216

Day 3 - March 20, 2022: Return to Los Angeles

Morning & Afternoon:
- Take a flight from Detroit back to Los Angeles. We recommend Flight F3536543 at 17:25 (826 USD per person). This will give you ample time to reach the airport and complete check-in procedures.
   Departure: Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (DTW)
   Arrival: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX)
   Flight Time: 4 hours 41 minutes

Evening:
- Upon arrival in Los Angeles, take a taxi to your desired location.
   Estimated Taxi Fare: $60 - $85 (depending on traffic)

Total Cost for Two People:
- Flights: $1222
- Accommodation: Approximately $135 per night ($405 total for 3 nights)
- Food and Local Transportation: $200
- Museum Entrance Fees: $48
- Taxi Fares: $105 - $145 (depending on traffic)

Total Cost: $1930 - $2055 (within your budget of $2,000)
